comment: The Chinese military has million in active service, with an additional million in reserves. We need Americans to stay armed. We cant count on a military who kowtows to the CCP.
amr:
# ::snt The Chinese military has million in active service, with an additional million in reserves. We need Americans to stay armed. We cant count on a military who kowtows to the CCP.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (m2 / military
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "China")))
            :ARG1 (m3 / military
                  :quant 1000000
                  :ARG0-of (a / activity-06)
                  :ARG1-of (r / reserve-01
                        :mod (a2 / additional))))
      :snt2 (n2 / need-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (s / stay-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "America")))
                  :ARG3 (a3 / arm-01
                        :ARG1 p)))
      :snt3 (p2 / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c3 / count-03
                  :ARG0 (w2 / we)
                  :ARG1 (m4 / military
                        :ARG0-of (k / kowtow-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / political-party
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "CCP")))))))

comment: This is exact reason why we need to stay heavily armed as citizens.
amr:

(r / reason
      :domain (t / this)
      :mod (e / exact)
      :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG1 (n / need-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (s / stay-01
                        :ARG1 w
                        :ARG3 (a / arm-01
                              :ARG1 w
                              :manner (h / heavy)
                              :prep-as (c2 / citizen
                                    :domain w))))))
